title: The Relevance of TypeScript in 2022
content:
Itâ€™s 2022. And the current relevance of TypeScript is undisputed. TypeScript has dominated the front-end developer experience by many, many accounts. By now you likely already know that TypeScript is a superset of JavaScript, building on JavaScript by adding …

The Relevance of TypeScript in 2022 originally published on CSS-Tricks. You should get the newsletter and become a supporter.
description: The current relevance of TypeScript is undisputed. But as we get into 2022, just how relevant is TypeScript going to be moving forward?
